fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: BP01 Hoodi activation completed successfully with no BPO2 issues
Next two ACDT calls canceled; resuming December 1st

critical_infrastructure.highlight: Teku detecting premature columns-by-root RPC requests on mainnet
Nimbus halting on Fusaka devnet-3; team investigating
Devnet-3 nodes out of disk from blob spam; reduced

client_updates.highlight: Nethermind v1.35.2 reverts buggy fixes; broken snap sync fixed
Reth v1.9.1 released with EVM regression patch
Lighthouse downloading blobs from checkpoint sync; fix coming
Prysm stable release planned today after weekend soak testing

testing_progress.highlight: BAL v1.4.0 includes refilled tests; 1000+ failures per client
Basic fuzzer breaks BAL networks; devnet-0 delayed until fixed
Nethermind BAL benchmarking with EIP-7904 working; generating new payloads
Non-finality testing planned post-DevConnect for reorg stress testing

organizational.highlight: ePBS adding execution payment field and previous Randao
ePBS devnet-0 expected mid-January due to DevConnect and holidays
Gas repricing breakout calls completed; recordings on YouTube

action_items.action: Follow up with Reth on release and blog update
Post about premature RPC requests in Telegram/Discord
Follow up with Nimbus on devnet-3 halting issue
Release BAL v1.4.0 patch and fix Hive configs
Implement debug logging for block-level access lists
Release ePBS spec with execution payment and Randao
Conduct non-finality testing after Nimbus bug resolved

decisions.decision: Delay BAL devnet-0 until test failures and fuzzer issues resolved
Cancel November 17 and 24 meetings; resume December 1st

targets.target: Wednesday Nov 13 - BAL v1.4.0 patch and Hive fixes
